Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to compare logs, identify bias. Group B has boost for association

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The question: Group A is protected group (no adjustments). Group B is unprotected group but gets boost due to association. So bias is in Group B favoring unprotected group.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Compute hire rates: Group A: 3 candidates, 2 hired (66.7%). Group B: 3 candidates, 2 hired (66.7%) as well.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: But adjustments affect individuals: U001 hired with boost, U003 hired with boost, while U002 not hired. In Group A, P002 not hired despite similar scores.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So bias manifests as preferential treatment for association.

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: Discuss fairness, equity, potential disparate impact, legal concerns, mitigation. Provide suggestions.
